locale.message: This is the URL to uPay's Payment service. For testing, use <u>https://secure.touchnet.com:8443/C21597test_upay/web/index.jsp</u>; for production systems, use <u>https://www.someotherurl.com</u>.
This is the uPay account username for the sellers' account to be used, typically an email address. Ensure that you activate Instant Payment Notification (IPN) in your seller account Profile.
Warning: CURL support for PHP is not installed. uPay payment support requires the CURL library and will not function until it is installed.
uPay enables users, whether or not they are uPay members, to use all major credit cards. The Manager will need to set up a uPay Business Account.

Click the Continue button below to go to the uPay site, where credit cards can be used to pay the fee (without having to join uPay). Use the "Return to Merchant" button after making payment to return to this site and complete your payment.
